element.name: EMS Agency Service Area States
element.definition: The states in which the EMS Agency provides services including the state associated with the EMS Agency Number.
element.v3Comment:
Element added to document all of the states in which the EMS agency provides services. Each state listed is associated with the counties, census tracts, and ZIP codes within the EMS Agency Service Area for each state.
GNIS Codes Website: http://geonames.usgs.gov/domestic/download_data.htm
